FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our plans

You can use apps when connected to WiFi. Without a data plan, apps won't work over cellular. Our Talk Plus plan includes 500MB for basic app functionality like messaging apps.

These plans are perfect for seniors who primarily call and text, kids getting their first phone, backup phones, or anyone who has WiFi access everywhere and doesn't need cellular data.

Yes! Any phone compatible with our network will work. Your smartphone will function normally for calls and texts, and use WiFi for data-dependent features like browsing and apps.

Absolutely! You can upgrade to any of our data plans at any time through the Vouch Mobile app. Changes take effect on your next billing cycle.

Yes, truly unlimited! Send and receive as many text messages (SMS and MMS) as you want with no limits or extra charges.

Yes, MMS (picture and video messaging) is included in all our talk and text plans at no extra charge.
